page.title: 13LAW AND ORDER IN BROMPTON
page.content: The village policeman resident in Brompton has also to cover Danby Wiske ,Streetlam,part of Deighton,Winton , Kirby Sigston,Sowerby-under-Cotcliffe & Bullamoor outside Northallerton town area.Farming matters involving fire arms,poaching,trespass & farm accidents form a part of his work which is otherwise largely taken up with domestic disputes,under age drinking,drunkenness & vandalism.These cases are relatively few & there is little serious crime in the area.The constable controls people & traffic on village occasions eg.Whitsuntide Carnival.His local knowledge is invaluable in solving petty crime & would be a starting point for any major investigation.He is also actively involved in the community eg.Youth Club,Squash Club,Rugby Club & giving talks on crime prevention.
